reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress for its amazing fit, beautiful style that makes them feel sexy, and excellent quality. The dress hugs the body in all the right places, with one customer noting it's thick enough not to show underwear lines, and they particularly appreciate the royal blue version. However, the sizing receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it runs a bit small, especially in the top half. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prettier in person
items.body: I LOVE THIS DRESS!! The color is fab and the fabric is thick and definitely bodycon style. It’s a bit pricey but i would say that it is worth it. I needed a red dress for my cruise and this one worked the best. It's classy, sassy and very flattering; I want more colors. I am typically a size sm/md (4), 5'4, 34DD, I’m busty but not super shapely...(more like and inverted triangle) and the small fit perfect. I ordered medium first and felt like it wasn't holding me in tight enough and the straps were a little too loose , but the small fits like a glove and is extremely comfortable. I want it in more colors. I have some complaints about seller/shipping issues; one of the sizes I ordered must have been returned by someone else because it reeked of fabric softener and was likely washed and the seller also sent me a totally different dress when I ordered the small. Read more
items.author: KR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits like a glove, hugs curves
items.body: I absolutely love this dress. Because it looks more expensive than it actually is. The quality is great, it feels a little on the heavy side but I like that it didn’t make me hot I wore it in Florida weather. It’s very stretchy, hugs every curve. The color is actually a little more like a coral/blush but it’s very pretty and it was perfect for what I was looking for. I’m small on top and bigger on the bottom. It offers a lot of support on topics it doesn’t have any padding so if you have nothing up there is will show. I used inserts that stick on to make that look better since I’m not gifted on that department. I didn’t want the bra to show and it worked perfectly for me. I usually have a problem clothes fitting my big around the waist but this was a good fit. The hip area was also stretchy enough so I was able to move around and didn’t feel like it would ride up. The length was good for me because I didn’t want it to be too short witch made it appropriate for a wedding and I felt comfortable wearing it. The zipper worked very smooth and I will definitely be buying more from this brand. I’m 5’4 and I weight 138lbs I ordered a small and I’m happy with my purchase Read more
items.author: Kelly Love

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Fit my girlfriend perfectly (small). The shape / style is great. Shows of her physique perfectly. We didn't realize it can be worn as a short dress or longer. Very nice surprise. Read more
items.author: grant garber

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super elegant look and nice fit. But, some may find it doesn't match their style
items.body: Excellent textured fabric gives an elegant look. Husband thought it fit excellent and really likes the look. Wife did not like the cross straps in the front. Great color and has a polished look. This was a mixed review as male thought it was fabulous and female wearing it felt it wasn't her style. Read more
items.author: DL NB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it you know you want to
items.body: Love this dress! It hugs and all the right places and the fabric isn’t overly thick so you still feel very breathable. I work for my bachelorette neon themed night and it was a complete hit. I didn’t feel like it was gonna break and the zipper was beautiful. It even has a top class but like keeps everything together. If I had a complaint, the only thing would be is that I can’t wear a bra with it. My chest is a little on the larger side, but with some adequately placed boob tape you wouldn’t even noticed. If you’re wondering whether or not you should get this dress or any dress for that matter that’s on this scroll I would say just get it. You won’t be disappointed. Read more
items.author: paige wells

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disappointing
items.body: The dress is cut for someone with very very large hips. It fit everywhere else but just bulged unflatteringly with extra fabric in the hip area. Read more
items.author: Kdouglas91

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It was lost but worth the wait!
items.body: The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5, is because the dress was ordered for a special occasion. I ordered it in plenty of time to get it using prime. The dress was lost. I got the last one in my size and the color I wanted, so finding a replacement wasn't happening. Amazon can't through with making everything right, because they're awesome like that. When I left for my anniversary getaway without this spectacular dress, I was pretty disappointed and then halfway to our destination when I received the notice it would be delivered at my home that day... Life happens and AGAIN, Amazon rocked. I had to wear a different dress, but it's okay, because I have this one now and it fits like it was truly made for me. For reference, I'm 5'8", 140lbs, measurements are : Bust: 34DD Waist: 28 Hips: 37 The dress, the color the material are EVERYTHING! The picture shows the true color of the dress. I'm not wearing any type of shape wear. The material is true bandage material. Thick, gorgeous and a gorgeous sheen to it. No stitching issues. It has a hook closure at the top of the zipper for easy zipping! I can't wait to wear it to the next grand adventure my husband takes me on!! Read more
items.author: j. krum

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: Great dress. Good quality. Fits well. I have worn it a few times and hold up well to washing. I get compliments every time I wear it, accentuates my curves and makes my tummy look small. Highly recommend. I got this is white size M. I typically wear a Small but wanted a little room to move around comfortably. Glad I did. Read more
items.author: Cris

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red3, Antipink3, Black, Black3, Ginger, Beige, Grassgreen, Lightgreen, Winered, Gold, Blue, Multicolor, Orangepink, Antipink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
